### Describe the bug
A clear description of what the bug is. Feel free to add pictures or videos (They really help!)

### To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open map ...
2. Do ...
3. See error

### Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
